scripts.start:server:dev: npm run clean:client:prod && npm --prefix ./server run server:dev
scripts.start:server:dev:debug: npm run clean:client:prod && npm --prefix ./server run server:dev:debug
scripts.start:server:staging: npm run start:client:prod && npm --prefix ./server run server:staging
scripts.server:dev:debug: npx cross-env DEBUG=* node -r babel-register -r dotenv/config ./bin/www.js dotenv_config_path='../.env'
scripts.server:prod: npm run clean:server:prod && npx babel -d ./build/server ./server -s && node -r dotenv/config ./build/server/bin/www.js dotenv_config_path='.env'
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run watch:server:dev" "npm run watch:client:dev"
scripts.prod: REACT_APP_API_PORT=${REACT_APP_API_PORT:=$PORT}; npm run start:client:prod && npm run server:prod
scripts.start:client:prod: npm run clean:client:prod && npm --prefix ./client run client:prod && mkdir -p build/client/build && mv client/build/ build/client/
